code: import React,{useRef}from'react';import'./Contact.css';import emailjs from'@emailjs/browser';import{jsx as _jsx}from"react/jsx-runtime";import{jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";const Contact=()=>{const form=useRef();const sendEmail=e=>{e.preventDefault();{/* Set up sendForm here: https://www.emailjs.com */}emailjs.sendForm('service_q484yf7','template_a7qrcdl',form.current,'R8Suz9o57NTK5a2s9').then(result=>{console.log(result.text);e.target.reset();alert('Email Sent!');},error=>{console.log(error.text);alert('Error - email me directly instead');});};return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("section",{id:"contactPage",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{id:"contact",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h1",{className:"contactPageTitle",children:"Contact Us"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("span",{className:"contactDesc",children:"Please fill out the form if you have any inquiries!"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("form",{className:"contactForm",ref:form,onSubmit:sendEmail,children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("input",{type:"text",className:"name",placeholder:"Your Name",name:"from_name"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("input",{type:"email",className:"email",placeholder:"Your Email",name:"from_email"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("textarea",{className:"msg",rows:"8",placeholder:"Your Message",name:"message"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{type:"submit",value:"Send",className:"submitBtn",children:"Submit"})]})]})});};export default Contact;
